      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getL1ByParam(java.lang.String paramName)
      Get the L1 coefficient for the given parameter.
      double getL2ByParam(java.lang.String paramName)
      Get the L2 coefficient for the given parameter.
      boolean isPretrain() 
      boolean isPretrainParam(java.lang.String paramName)
      Is the specified parameter a layerwise pretraining only parameter?
      For example, visible bias params in an autoencoder (or, decoder params in a variational autoencoder) aren't used during supervised backprop.
      Layers (like DenseLayer, etc) with no pretrainable parameters will return false for all (valid) inputs.
      void setPretrain(boolean pretrain)

        public double getL1ByParam(java.lang.String paramName)
        Description copied from class: Layer
        Get the L1 coefficient for the given parameter. Different parameters may have different L1 values, even for a single .l1(x) configuration. For example, biases generally aren't L1 regularized, even if weights are
        Specified by:

        Overrides:

      • isPretrainParam

        public boolean isPretrainParam(java.lang.String paramName)
        Description copied from class: Layer
        Is the specified parameter a layerwise pretraining only parameter?
        For example, visible bias params in an autoencoder (or, decoder params in a variational autoencoder) aren't used during supervised backprop.
        Layers (like DenseLayer, etc) with no pretrainable parameters will return false for all (valid) inputs.
        Specified by:
        isPretrainParam in interface TrainingConfig
        Overrides:
        isPretrainParam in class FeedForwardLayer
        Parameters:
        paramName - Parameter name/key
        Returns:
        True if the parameter is for layerwise pretraining only, false otherwise

      • isPretrain

        public boolean isPretrain()
        Specified by:
        isPretrain in interface TrainingConfig
        Overrides:
        isPretrain in class FeedForwardLayer
        Returns:
        True if the layer is set up for layerwise pretraining

      • setPretrain

        public void setPretrain(boolean pretrain)
        Specified by:
        setPretrain in interface TrainingConfig
        Overrides:
        setPretrain in class Layer
        Parameters:
        pretrain - Whether the layer is currently undergoing layerwise unsupervised training, or multi-layer backprop
